author: Darryl Sellers
title: Netbriefings Announces New President
text:
Netbriefings, a full service web technology provider and video webcasting expert, announced the hiring of its new president, Charles Peters. Mr. Peters will formulate and implement the strategic plan that guides the direction of Netbriefings as well as oversee the complete operation of the company.
This new hire comes on the heels of the company's new ownership. New ownership enables Netbriefings to continue to serve its customers and prospects with competitively priced products, outstanding customer support and enhanced webcasting technology.
Peters has more than 30 years of experience in business management and sales leadership. "I am excited to lead the Netbriefings team and further grow its position in the video based communications market," said Charles Peters, president of Netbriefings. "Our toolset and webcasting expertise will pave the way in developing new customer relationships."
About Netbriefings
Netbriefings is a full service web technology provider specializing in managed service webcasts, self-service webinars and video email. Its Proclaim web solutions are the most effective way to personally connect with prospects and customers. Proclaim Enterprise provides managed service webcasting to large audiences and is designed for town hall meetings, CEO meetings and multi-day conferences. It caters to high profile events that cannot fail with personalized support and services. Proclaim Collaborator provides real-time collaboration in a self-service webinar tool. Proclaim Messenger allows individuals to easily create and share video email messages with PowerPoints.
